name: Koffing

attacks.name: Foul Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Poisoned; if tails, it is now Confused.

flavorText: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning. LV. 13 #109

strengths: Foul Gas guarantees a status condition - either Poison or Confusion
50 HP provides good survivability for a Basic Pokemon
Poison deals damage between turns, providing passive damage
Confusion can disrupt opponent's strategy and potentially cause self-damage
Low retreat cost of 1 allows for decent mobility
Evolves into Weezing for enhanced poison abilities
weaknesses: Only deals 10 damage, which is quite low
Requires 2 Grass energy to attack, which can be slow to set up
Cannot choose which status condition to inflict
No resistance to mitigate incoming damage
synergies: Gust of Wind keeps poisoned/confused Pokemon in the active position
PlusPower increases Foul Gas damage to 20
Defender helps Koffing survive while repeatedly applying status conditions
Switch allows pivoting after applying status effects
counters: Full Heal or Switch to remove status conditions
High damage attackers that can knockout before status matters
